lead_paragraph: A reader takes issue with Donald Trump and Wayne LaPierre’s belief in the value of an armed bystander who stops a terrorist.

headline.main: Armed Good Guys? ‘The Reality of a Firefight Is a Form of Madness’
headline.print_headline: ‘The Reality of a Firefight Is a Form of Madness’

snippet: A reader takes issue with Donald Trump and Wayne LaPierre’s belief in the value of an armed bystander who stops a terrorist.
